title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2B.17 - Higher Fines Signs and Plaque (R2-6P, R2-10, and R2-11)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2B.17 - Higher Fines Signs and Plaque (R2-6P, R2-10, and R2-11)

State Regulations
DELETE Paragraphs 06 and 07. INSERT the following paragraph: Standard: 01A The Higher Fines signs and plaques shall only be used
in conjunction with school signing when a school speed limit has been
established. 01B The R2-10 sign shall not be used in New York. The
R2-6aP and R2-6bP plaques shall not be used in New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2B.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
